name: RheumatoidArthritisMedicationManagement
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: med man
des:
This skill is designed to be used for educational purposes to provide information to the consumer regarding storage considerations of refrigerated rheumatoid arthritis medications. 
This skill will utilize and provide information to consumers regarding medications used in the treatment of Rheumatoid arthritis that need to be refrigerated. 
Usage of this skill will, therefore, provide consumers with information regarding if and how long
their rheumatoid arthritis medications can be stored at room temperature if taken out of the refrigerator.
This is a healthcare related skill that is designed to be used for educational purposes only and should not replace healthcare providers/professionals.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
